Sentencas: The objective of this study was to propose a fusion-biomass hybrid system with fuel cell and gas turbine as a technical option for fusion application to generate electricity.
Titulo: Cost analysis and energy return on investment of fuel cell and gas turbine integrated fusion-biomass hybrid system; application of a small scale conceptual fusion reactor GNOME

Sentencas: Fusion reactor with dual coolants lithium lead (DCLL) blanket design employing SiCj/SiC could provide over 900 degrees C of high temperature heat for waste biomass gasification process.
Titulo: Cost analysis and energy return on investment of fuel cell and gas turbine integrated fusion-biomass hybrid system; application of a small scale conceptual fusion reactor GNOME

Sentencas: Waste biomass such as municipal waste solid and residues from agricultural and forestry sites could be sufficiently processed.
Titulo: Cost analysis and energy return on investment of fuel cell and gas turbine integrated fusion-biomass hybrid system; application of a small scale conceptual fusion reactor GNOME

Sentencas: A small scale conceptual fusion reactor GNOME is designed under the assumption that the system will be deployed in a place where a low amount of waste biomass is generated.
Titulo: Cost analysis and energy return on investment of fuel cell and gas turbine integrated fusion-biomass hybrid system; application of a small scale conceptual fusion reactor GNOME

Sentencas: Results showed that 364 MW GNOME reactor could produce 410 MWth power through divertor and blanket according to fusion power plant system analysis code (FUSAC).
Titulo: Cost analysis and energy return on investment of fuel cell and gas turbine integrated fusion-biomass hybrid system; application of a small scale conceptual fusion reactor GNOME

Sentencas: The hybrid system enables to generate 454 MWe with 80% capacity factor which is 7008 h operation in a year.
Titulo: Cost analysis and energy return on investment of fuel cell and gas turbine integrated fusion-biomass hybrid system; application of a small scale conceptual fusion reactor GNOME

Sentencas: Net electricity of 289 MWe could be produced through solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine showed 30% of overall system efficiency due to the high self-consumption of GNOME reactor.
Titulo: Cost analysis and energy return on investment of fuel cell and gas turbine integrated fusion-biomass hybrid system; application of a small scale conceptual fusion reactor GNOME

Sentencas: The levelized cost of electricity (LCOE) is 208 $/MWh and the energy return on investment (EROI) is 3.9.
Titulo: Cost analysis and energy return on investment of fuel cell and gas turbine integrated fusion-biomass hybrid system; application of a small scale conceptual fusion reactor GNOME
